title: Custom yellow text (without name) before/after a game

embed.description: The easy way to save screenshots, GIFs, and websites. Make everyone happy by sharing smarter, faster, and with your point crystal clear.

body: So I've seen this (link)  a couple times now and I'm genuinely curious as to how people are doing this. Does anyone know how they are doing it?

replies.body:
Hey! 

So this is the new "/me" functionality for chat.

You can type "/me" in chat and anything you type after it will show up in that text format after your name.


Example:

"/me needs practice at ADC." would read in the chat as the following:

"_**Riot Codebear**_ needs practice at ADC."

Hope this sheds some light on it :-D
How does this work nowadays, since "/me" seems to not work anymore?
It does still work but just like as "AstralMinds" said, it doesnt work in champion select and in game.
it still works just dosnt work in champ select and in game im not sure.
